item.title: Macrofauna associated with the brown algae Dictyota spp. (Phaeophyceae, Dictyotaceae) in the Sebasti찾o Gomes Reef and Abrolhos Archipelago, Bahia, Brazil
Benthic Ecology
item.description: During my undergraduate program at the University of S찾o Paulo, I studied the diversity of invertebrates associated with brown seaweed (Dictyota spp.) and their patterns of distribution in time and space (Cunha et al. 2013 CSR). This project, together with many others from different Brazilian institutions and labs, targeted the Abrolhos Archipelago, the largest and most diverse reef complex of the South Atlantic. This work was done in the Lab of Deep Sea Ecology and Evolution at the University of S찾o Paulo. Broader initiative: Pr처-Abrolhos.
